label: conformityInformation
comment: An array of claim objects representing various product conformity claims about the product / batch.  These can be sustainability claims, circularity claims, or any other claim type within the conformity topic list.

rangeIncludes.comment: The SustainabilityClaim class represents specific claims regarding the sustainability of a product, providing details about the metrics, thresholds, and evidences supporting the claim.

domainIncludes.comment: The ProductInformation class encapsulates detailed information regarding a specific product, including its identification details, manufacturer, and other pertinent details.
